revised_title: Volta's Discovery of Electrochemical Series and the Development of the First Battery
tldr: Alexander Volta describes his experiments on the electricity produced by the contact of different metals and conducts, leading to the development of an early battery-like device. This apparatus, consisting of alternating metal and non-metal conductors, produces continuous and spontaneous electrical effects, paving the way for further research in electrochemistry and the development of modern batteries.
